titleStmt.title: Agreement betwixt the present and the former government, or, A discourse of this monarchy, whether elective or hereditary? also of abdication, vacancy, interregnum, present possession of the crown, and the reputation of the Church of England ; with an answer to objections thence arising, against taking the new Oath of Allegiance, for the satisfaction of the scrupulous / by a divine of the Church of England, the author of a little tract entituled, Obedience due to the present King, nothwithstanding our oaths to the former.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

titleStmt.title: Agreement betwixt the present and the former government, or, A discourse of this monarchy, whether elective or hereditary? also of abdication, vacancy, interregnum, present possession of the crown, and the reputation of the Church of England ; with an answer to objections thence arising, against taking the new Oath of Allegiance, for the satisfaction of the scrupulous / by a divine of the Church of England, the author of a little tract entituled, Obedience due to the present King, nothwithstanding our oaths to the former.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A.C. and are to sold by Charles Yeo ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Fullwood by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
